candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (6 votes): groq: As a Bitcoin mining stock, RIOT follows crypto cycles and exhibits high volatility, similar to MARA. It exhibits high volatility tied to Bitcoin price swings and crypto market cycles, with strong trends followed by sharp reversals similar to SOL-USD. Recent price weakness from the broader crypto downturn in early 2024 positions it for mean reversion as Bitcoin stabilizes and mining profitability rebounds, offering sector rotation from tech to crypto proxies. High retail interest adds meme-like potential during rallies.
